item.title: VXR: New beginnings
item.description: Index New beginnings Introduction Goals The first weeks! Up next References New beginnings Introduction VXR is a project that emerged from the desire to build a general purpose rendering tool that I could use to implement anything I was curious about or wanted to learn about. It was quickly restated and expanded as the tool on which my Bachelor's degree personal project would take form during this next year.
